SEARCH

Package org.hms.views

package org.hms.views
This package contains the view classes for the Hospital Management System (HMS).

These classes are responsible for the presentation layer of the system, including user interfaces and visual components.

  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    org.hms
    This package contains the main classes for the Hospital Management System (HMS).
    org.hms.entities
    This package contains the entity classes for the Hospital Management System (HMS).
    org.hms.services
    This package contains the service classes for the Hospital Management System (HMS).
    org.hms.utils
    This package contains utility classes for the Hospital Management System (HMS).
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AbstractMainMenu
    AbstractMainMenu provides the common behavior for main menus in the application.
    AbstractMenu
    AbstractMenu serves as a base class for different menu implementations in the application.
    AdminMenu
    The AdminMenu class handles the display and execution of menu options specific to the administrator role.
    AuthenticationMenu
    AuthenticationMenu is responsible for managing the user authentication flow.
    DoctorMenu
    The DoctorMenu class provides a menu interface for doctors to perform various actions related to appointment management, medical record handling, and schedule viewing.
    PatientMenu
    The PatientMenu class represents the main menu for a Patient user.
    PharmacistMenu
    PharmacistMenu class is a view class that displays the main menu for the pharmacist user.
